meanings.sent1: The country agreed to remove nontariffs barriers to encourage trade.
meanings.sent2: The nontariffs policies aim to promote fair competition among businesses.
meanings.sent3: The absence of nontariffs measures made importing goods easier.
meanings.sent4: Her approach to negotiations was as straightforward as nontariffs regulations.
meanings.sent5: The impact of nontariffs rules on the economy cannot be underestimated.

meanings.definition: Relating to trade barriers other than tariffs.
meanings.sent1: Companies face challenges due to various nontariffs restrictions.
meanings.sent2: Negotiations focused on addressing nontariffs obstacles to international trade.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected increase in nontariffs barriers caused delays in shipments.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of nontariffs regulations requires careful navigation.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the implications of nontariffs policies is crucial for exporters.
